Exercise 1-4:Probability: controlled distribution of random numbers

Choose distribution:

Notes

This algorithm takes an equation and distributes random numbers based on it.

If given the linear equation y = x, number distribution will grow linearly.

If given y = xn, number distribution will grow exponentially based on n

All examples are based on exercises from The Nature of Code, Â© 2012 by Daniel Shiffman.
